faqs.q: How many calories in a Little Caesars pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: About 2560 calories for one large (8 slices).

faqs.q: What are the macros for a Little Caesars pizza?
faqs.a: Per large pepperoni: 256 g carbs, 96 g protein, 112 g fat.

faqs.q: Calories per slice in a Little Caesars pizza?
faqs.a: Roughly 320 kcal per slice for a large pepperoni (1/8 pizza).

faqs.q: Does Little Caesars pizza have high sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 6000 mg per large pizza, mostly from cheese and sauce.

faqs.q: How do toppings affect calories in Little Caesars pizza?
faqs.a: Meats like pepperoni add 40 kcal per slice; veggies add fewer, around 10-20 kcal.
